settings.question: I live in a country where I am unable to purchase directly from nothing.tech. Why can't I enjoy the offer?
settings.answer: Currently, the bundle offer  is only available on nothing.tech. We are encouraging our partners to offer the same but it’s at their discretion. We recommend you check your local retailers for additional promotions. Apologies for the inconvenience.

settings.question: Which countries are participating in the offer?
settings.answer: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdoms.

settings.question: Will Phone (1) and Ear (stick) arrive at the same time?
I did not get a confirmation of my order. What do I do now?
How do returns work?
settings.answer: If you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you will need to return both the Phone (1) and Ear (stick) together. This is still the case if you want to keep one of the items. In this situation, you will need to repurchase the item separately.
